game.name: BRUTAL KATANA
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Slice meat statues in half as quickly as possible. An easy to learn but hard to master game with satisfying parkour movement and combat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Slice meat statues in half as quickly as possible. An easy to learn but hard to master game with satisfying parkour movement and combat.
